name: farci
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of food) filled with a stuffing (= a mixture of food, such as bread, onions, and herbs, put inside other food): The chicken farci was dry, and the sides were overcooked. We had the sausages with cabbage farci. Synonym
stuffed (COOKING)
More examplesFewer examplesThe breast of veal farci was served with frites.Tomato farci can be made either with freshly minced lamb or with cooked meat.

a mixture of food, such as bread, onions, and herbs, that is used to fill other food, such as a chicken or a vegetable, before it is cooked: She watched while he made the farci for the aubergines. You can use leftover meat or vegetables in the farci. Synonym
stuffing (FOOD)
More examplesFewer examplesCook for 1—2 hours, depending on the size of the farci.
